author: Special Correspondent
text:
The members of Students Federation of India staging a demonstration in front of the Government Arts College in Salem on Friday.

Members of the Students Federation of India (SFI) staged a demonstration in front of the Government Arts College in the city on Friday demanding the resignation of the Union Ministers Smriti Irani and Bandaru Dattatreya in connection with the death of Rohith Vemula, a research scholar of the campus of University of Hyderabad.

Demand

They also demanded the resignation of the Vice-Chancellor of the University.

Vice president of the Salem district unit of the SFI, Kalaiarasan, led the agitation,sub in which Ramachandran, district secretary. Mohan, district deputy secretary and others participated.
title: SFI activists stage demonstration
